19.eng-name: The Book of the Prayer for the Two 'Eids

hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Urwah that he narrated from Aishah that Abu Bakr As-Siddiq :Entered upon her and there were two girls with her beating the duff and singing, and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was covered with his garment. He uncovered his face and said: "Let them be there, O Abu Bakr, for these are the days of 'Eid." Those were the days of Mina and the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) was in Al-Madinah on that day

chapter.ara-name: باب الرُّخْصَةِ فِي الاِسْتِمَاعِ إِلَى الْغِنَاءِ وَضَرْبِ الدُّفِّ يَوْمَ الْعِيدِ
chapter.eng-name: Concession allowing listening to singing and beating the duff on the day of 'Eid
